greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A005187(n) XOR A005187(n+1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
mathematica: Function[t, BitXor @@ # & /@ Transpose@ {Most@ t, Rest@ t}]@ Table[2 n - DigitCount[2 n, 2, 1], {n, 0, 106}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 15 2017, after _Harvey P. Dale_ at A005187 *)
program: (Scheme) (define (A279357 n) (A003987bi (A005187 (+ 1 n)) (A005187 n))) ;; Here A003987bi implements a bitwise-XOR (A003987).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 15 2017
